value:
I've never seen Father dressed up
like THAT before. As strange as it is,
the spring festival outfit suits him.

I'd much rather be sword fighting,
but if we're here to celebrate,
then I'll give it my all!

Enjoy yourself, but this is a serious
matter. If you're not careful, someone
will have MORE fun than you.

Mother, Uncle...I will use this
experience to further my mastery
of the sword. Somehow...

Gaudy clothing such as this isn't
practical for swordplay. I can't tell if
I'm wearing it right. Is this a prank?

Time to be merry! You're invited
to the spring festival by
$Nf.
A fresh spring breeze is at my back!

The new season has
revitalized me!

Maybe the nice weather has softened
me up too much...

Why, thank you! I'll be sure
to train extra hard!

My name is Fir and I study the sword.
Father kept shouting about the spring
festival so I had to go see it for myself!

Have you seen my father around
here, $Nu?$k$pIt appears he's been looking for me.
I can only hope he's not
troubling the festival patrons.$k$pFather is a little... No. He's
EXTREMELY overprotective. But
it's his way of showing he cares.$k$pWhen I think of it in that regard,
I feel a warmth as though I'm being
embraced by the springtime sun.$k$pThese thoughts help thaw our hearts
and strengthen our bonds. I hope this
festival can help us remember that.
てやっ
春ですよ！
きゃっ！
痛いです…！
Spring is here!
Let's have some fun!
Rabbit war cry!
Hop! Jump! Smack!
I'll keep bouncing...
えへへ…
I'm Fir, the spring festival's best bun! Best bun-bun? Bun-bun-bun...
Whoa! You're crafty, waiting till I'm busy with the festival to launch a sneak attack!
T-this outfit is...um...well, there certainly are a lot of unique customs out there, huh...?
I do like rabbits. You can find them no matter how far you roam. They're delicious.
These ears aren't just for show... I can hear the enemy's footsteps!
Well... there is one person I'd like to show this outfit off to. But... Y'know...
Let's put some of this bunny energy to a good use—training!
Sunshiney warm!
Getting colder...
Hoppy to help!
